CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The decyl-substituted PffBB-10 - based device showed a good PCE of 8.22% with a high V oc of 0.93 V , a J sc of 14.62 mA cm^-2 , and a FF of 60.44% when the active layer was coated at 80 ° C. On the other hand , PffBB-10 - based devices fabricated at 60 and 100 °C spin - coating temperatures exhibited inferior photovoltaic performance with a lower J sc and a much lower FF of ∼ 56% except for a similar V oc .

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| Decyl-substituted PffBB-10 |
| PffBB-10 |

The paragraph is discussing the photovoltaic performance of devices based on two different materials: decyl-substituted PffBB-10 and PffBB-10. Both materials are identified in the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| Decyl-substituted PffBB-10 |
| PffBB-10 |

The paragraph discusses the photovoltaic performance of devices based on two different materials: decyl-substituted PffBB-10 and PffBB-10. These are the only entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to materials. Other entities such as "PCE", "V oc", "J sc", "FF", "°C", and "devices" do not refer to specific materials and are not included in the table.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The decyl-substituted PffBB-10 - based device showed a good PCE of 8.22% with a high V oc of 0.93 V , a J sc of 14.62 mA cm^-2 , and a FF of 60.44% when the active layer was coated at 80 ° C. On the other hand , PffBB-10 - based devices fabricated at 60 and 100 °C spin - coating temperatures exhibited inferior photovoltaic performance with a lower J sc and a much lower FF of ∼ 56% except for a similar V oc .

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency) |
| V oc (Open Circuit Voltage) |
| J sc (Short Circuit Current Density) |
| FF (Fill Factor) |
| active layer temperature (80 °C, 60 °C, 100 °C) |
| spin-coating temperature (60 °C, 100 °C) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency) |
| V oc (Open Circuit Voltage) |
| J sc (Short Circuit Current Density) |
| FF (Fill Factor) |
| active layer temperature |

Note: The entities "device", "PffBB-10 based", "showed", "exhibited inferior photovoltaic performance", "inferior", "similar", "except for", "much lower", and "except" do not clearly refer to material properties and have been removed.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The decyl-substituted PffBB-10 - based device showed a good PCE of 8.22% with a high V oc of 0.93 V , a J sc of 14.62 mA cm^-2 , and a FF of 60.44% when the active layer was coated at 80 ° C. On the other hand , PffBB-10 - based devices fabricated at 60 and 100 °C spin - coating temperatures exhibited inferior photovoltaic performance with a lower J sc and a much lower FF of ∼ 56% except for a similar V oc .

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value        |
|----------------------|
| PCE of 8.22%          |
| V oc of 0.93 V        |
| J sc of 14.62 mA cm^-2 |
| FF of 60.44%          |
| J sc of (inferior devices): lower                 |
| FF of (inferior devices): ∼ 56%                 |
| V oc of (inferior devices): similar             |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value        |
|----------------------|
| PCE: 8.22%            |
| V oc: 0.93 V          |

Note: PCE stands for Power Conversion Efficiency.
